item.title: #19 - Travel
item.description: We don’t get better over time. With every passing day, our abilities and capabilities to do something useful deplete. 1 Many people dream of traveling somewhere nice and beautiful. But in the future, we won’t have that much energy and resources to do so. We will all have our commitments to take care of or rather to serve to such as a mortgage, car loans, work, significant others. You know that.
